thread.title: Adams 12 school board candidate forum on Tuesday
thread.title_full: Adams 12 school board candidate forum on Tuesday

title: Adams 12 school board candidate forum on Tuesday
text:
Adams 12 school board candidate forum on Tuesday Posted: 10/17/2015 08:38:25 AM MDT 
What's up at school? 
Share news, events and photos from your school by emailing them to baxterj@broomfieldenterprise.com . 
A forum for candidates for the Adams 12 school district board will be from 6:30 to 8:30 p.m. Tuesday at Silver Hills Middle School, 12400 Huron St. in Westminster. 
School board members serve specific geographical areas of the district, but are voted on by all voters in the district. Candidates are: District No. 1, Norm Jennings and Seth "Isaiah" Thomas; District No. 2, Daniel Garcia and Jamey Lockley; District No. 4, Amira Amal Assad-Lucas, Brian M. Batz and Jessy Briton Hamilton; District No. 5, Stephanie James, Jeff Jasica, Laura P. Mitchell and Teresa Thomson Walsh. 
Broomfield is in District Nos. 3 and 5. 
For more information on the candidates and board member district boundaries, go to adams12.org/board_of_education/2015_election . Advertisement
